modName: Dx's Follower Pack - Demons - SAM - SOS - Better Males
summary: This Pack contains (for now) one Followere/Two Versions, more will follower, stay tuned.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/wAZC3cb.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/tPJFfaz.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][size=3][color=#cc0000][i]Name: Luzifer[/i]
[i]Race: Nord/Demon in his Human form[/i]
[i]Class: Battlemage/Warrior[/i]
[i]Start level 1 - x[/i]
[i]Weight: 90[/i]
[i]Height: 1.02

[img]https://i.imgur.com/tY4NFiW.jpg[/img]
[i]Name: Lord Luzifer[/i]
[i]Race: Nord/Demon[/i]
[i]Class: Battlemage/Warrior[/i]
[i]Start level 3 - x[/i]
[i]Weight: 90[/i]
[i]Height: 1.02[/i][/i]

[b]Can[/b][i] be married - if you're brave enough[/i]

[b][u]Where to find[/u][/b]

[/color][i][color=#cc0000]Dragon Bridge, Four Shields Tavern[/color]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/X0ew3Cp.jpg[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/aMiA2eN.png[/img]
[i][font=Georgia][size=3][size=3][color=#cc0000]With Nexus Mod Manager/Mod Organizer or manually in your data Folder[/color]
[/size][/size][/font][/i]
[color=#cc0000][img]https://i.imgur.com/UsDWjvb.png[/img][/color]

[color=#cc0000]Dragonborn.esm
Dawnguard.esm[/color]

[i][font=Georgia][size=3][size=3][color=#6fa8dc]Side Note - The Mod only containes Face Textures! :) No body mesh/textures.
[/color]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/2AvMHXr.png[/img]
